QuestData.Title: Favor of the Gronn
QuestData.Description: A token in the form of a small statuette falls from Dorgok's dead clutch. It bears a striking resemblance to one of the gronn.$B$BSurely, Commander Haephus Stonewall at Evergrove in the Ruuan Weald, up the ramp to the east, would be interested in this!
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver Gorgrom's Favor to Commander Haephus Stonewall at Evergrove in the Blade's Edge Mountains.
QuestData.CompletionText: Hello, $g lad : lass;, what news do you bring?
QuestData.RewardText: Oh, now that's pretty. Looks a lot like those gronn that are always bossing the Bladespire ogres around.$B$BOdd that you should find it in the hands of one of the Bloodmaul leaders.
